page.title: 04EDUCATION-PORTPATRICK
page.content: Portpatrick Primary School is a modern building of{open-plan}design. Providing{primary}education over 7 years,pupils enrolling in August from the age of 4yrs. 9mths.,the roll at present is 66 pupils,taught by 3 full-time teachers,including a teaching-head.There are three visiting specialists covering P.E.,Music and Learning Difficulties,also a visiting instructress on violin.A caretaker and assistant,together with cook and kitchen assistant make up domestic staff.An ancillary is present one day. All aspects of the curriculum are covered.Trips outwith village and visits to outdoor centres are arranged to broaden pupils' outlook.There is a bi-annual trip to London for seniors. Top classes have an evening club when badminton,chess etc may be played and all pupils may attend monthly disco.
